entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9 with temperature falling to 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning then rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. High 9 with temperature falling to 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
